intro: A Retro-FPS "virtual happy place", jeopardized with a naughty bug. Traverse this action-oriented roguelite blasting waifus to uncover dirty secrets on a personal computer!
description:
What is your happy place?
Maybe it's a bedroom. A calm place in the open. Your bathroom. Or maybe... your personal computer?

During times of need, a programmer developed a virtual cozy experience for his girlfriend.
It was a warm, isolated wood cabin on the snowy alps. With a chill-out music playing on the background, a nice place to stay for a while...
... if not by a system bug on the basement, showing a hidden path to another world.


On Fida Puti Samurai, you will incarnate as Liza, digging through a silly kind of rabbit hole:

- Traverse urban environments
- Visit 13 levels on urban settings
- Fight bunny-suit zombies, semi-naked waifus, punk gurls and others on 4 different enemy factions
- Use a wide variety of weapons from sledgehammers to dynamite and even panty-drying miniguns
- Discover the ability to transform into a Mahou Shoujo
- Uncover the secrets that lie on Zanardi's computer and his past
